Posting To External Site
Monday 06, August 2012

We’ve recently worked on a new feature that allows you to have data submissions to a form be pushed to an external site. Currently you can get json and xml data submissions posted to a rest service that can consume it. You may have noticed a new section Rest Services in the form view. To learn how to make use of these new feature, visit the formhub.org wiki on https://github.com/modilabs/formhub/wiki/Posting-To-External-Site.
